Class FileSystemTree.FileNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileSystemTree.FileNode
  • Enclosing class:
    FileSystemTree
    protected static class FileSystemTree.FileNode
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is used to store the file or the directory of the instances of FIleSystemTree

        private boolean addFileDir​(java.lang.String[] folder_arr,
                           boolean file)
        adds a file/firectory to the FileNode
        Parameters:
        folder_arr - string that contains the path of the file/directory to be added
        file - indicates if the file to be added is file or a directory
        Returns:
        true if the file is added and false otherwise

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)

        this method is called within printFileSystem() public no parameter method
